plan.name: Align Connect (HMO C-SNP)
plan.description:
$0 monthly Plan premium!

Available to Medicare beneficiaries with a diagnosis of dementia.

plan_overview.title: Align Connect (HMO C-SNP)
plan_overview.description: Align Connect (HMO C-SNP) helps your Medicare benefits work better for you – giving you more benefits when it matters the most.

features.title: Enhanced On-site Primary Care
features.description:
• $0 copay for in-room and office visits
  • $15 copay for specialist visits 
  • Regular, personalized in-room visits
  • Coordinates your clinical care
  • Direct member access

features.title: Maximum Enrollee Out-of-Pocket Costs
features.description:
• $3,500 per plan year
  • We pay 100% of costs after you spend $3,500 on Part A and Part B services

features.title: Dental
features.description:
• $0 copay for two preventive visits each year that include an oral exam, cleaning, and x-ray
  • Up to $500 for other dental services

features.title: Vision
features.description:
• $0 copay for a routine annual eye exam
  • $225 allowance for eyewear every year

features.title: Podiatry
features.description: • $0 copay for 4 routine foot care visits every year

features.title: Part D Prescription Drugs
features.description:
• $0 deductible for tier 1 drugs
  • Copays as low as $2 for one-month supply
  • Pharmacy coordination and monitoring

features.title: Skilled Nursing
features.description: • No prior hospital stay required for skilled nursing stays

features.title: Part A Services
features.description: $0 deductible for Part A services, like hospitalizations

features.title: Chiropractor and Acupuncture
features.description:
• $30 copay for office visits
  • 12 routine care visits annually per benefit

features.title: Over-the-Counter (OTC) Health Catalog Allowance
features.description:
$125 allowance per quarter for OTC items

Learn more about OTC items here!

features.title: In-Home (Post Hospital Stay) Personal Care Support
features.description: Six, 2-hour, private duty personal care visits following an inpatient hospital stay every year

service_areas.title: Service Areas
service_areas.description: Align Connect (HMO C-SNP) is offered in the following counties: Alachua, Hillsborough, Lee, Miami-Dade, Orange, Pinellas, and Sumter

benefits.title: Prescription Drug Benefits
benefits.description: Align Connect (HMO C-SNP) provides Medicare Part D prescription drug coverage through our partner Navitus Health Solutions, a full-service pharmacy benefit management company.

content.headline: What do I pay?
content.text: The amount you pay depends on the payment stage you are in when you fill your prescription. Your payment stage changes during the calendar year based on your total drug costs.

benefit_stages.title: Stage 1
benefit_stages.content:
Yearly Deductible: $480 for Tier 2, Tier 3, Tier 4, and Tier 5 Part D prescription drugs. For all other drugs in Tier 1, you will not have to pay any deductible and will start receiving coverage immediately.

  • Tier 1: $2
  • Tier 2: $15
  • Tier 3: $45
  • Tier 4: $95
  • Tier 5: 25%

benefit_stages.title: Stage 2
benefit_stages.content: Initial Coverage: After you have met your deductible (if applicable), the plan pays its share of the cost of your drugs and you pay your share of the cost. You generally stay in this stage until the amount of your year-to-date “total drug costs” reaches $4,430.

benefit_stages.title: Stage 3
benefit_stages.content:
Coverage Gap

After your total drug costs (including what our plan has paid and what you have paid) reach $4,430, you will pay no more than 25% coinsurance for generic drugs or 25% coinsurance for brand name drugs, for any drug tier during the coverage gap

benefit_stages.title: Stage 4
benefit_stages.content:
Catastrophic Coverage

After your yearly out-of-pocket drug costs (including drugs purchased through your retail pharmacy and through mail order) reach $7,050, you pay the greater of:

  • 5% coinsurance, or
  • $3.95 copayment for generic (including brand drugs treated as generic) and a $9.85 copayment for all other drugs.

content.text:
If you take many medications for more than one chronic health condition you may be eligible to participate in the Medication Therapy Management (MTM) program offered by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services.

Cost-sharing may differ based on point-of-service (retail, Long Term Care (LTC)), home infusion, whether the pharmacy is in our standard network, or whether the prescription is a short-term (30-day supply) or long-term (90-day supply).

documents.description: Access important plan information, documents, directories, and forms.

plan.headline: Shop C-SNP Plans for Florida

plans.name: Align Thrive (HMO I-SNP)
plans.description: Available to Medicare beneficiaries who meet the requirements for long-term care eligibility.

plan_overview.title: Align Thrive (HMO I-SNP)
plan_overview.description:
Align Thrive (HMO I-SNP) helps your Medicare benefits work better for you – giving you more benefits when it matters the most.

If you are full-dual eligible, with Extra Help, your premium would be $0. If you get Extra Help from Medicare, your monthly plan premium will be lower than what it would be if you didn’t get Extra Help from Medicare. Depending on your level of Extra Help, your premium may be anywhere between $0 and $24.80.

• $0 copay for in-room and office visits
  • $30 copay for specialist visits
  • Regular, personalized in-room visits
  • Coordinates your clinical care

  • Up to $500 allowance for comprehensive services

  • Up to $130 allowance for eyewear every year

features.title: Hearing
features.description:

  • Up to $800 allowance towards hearing aids every year

  • Copays as low as $2 for a one-month supply
  • Pharmacy coordination and monitoring
